text: فَٱنتَقَمۡنَا مِنۡهُمۡ فَأَغۡرَقۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡيَمِّ بِأَنَّهُمۡ كَذَّبُواْ بِـَٔايَٰتِنَا وَكَانُواْ عَنۡهَا غَٰفِلِينَ

translation.en: So We took retribution from them, and We drowned them in the sea because they denied Our signs and were heedless of them
translation.id: Maka Kami hukum sebagian di antara mereka, lalu Kami tenggelamkan mereka di laut karena mereka telah mendustakan ayat-ayat Kami dan melalaikan ayat-ayat Kami
